33d486b3-aa97-4c95-9dd9-4e85f24621bf.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Master I (PSM I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of Scrum mastery, including the concepts of applying Scrum, and proven an understanding of Scrum as described in the Scrum Guide. This individual has also demonstrated a consistent use of terminology and approach to Scrum.
33d486b3-aa97-4c95-9dd9-4e85f24621bf.name: Professional Scrum Master™ I (PSM I)

alignments.name: The Scrum Guide
alignments.description: Scrum is defined completely in the Scrum Guide by Ken Schwaber and Jeff Sutherland, the originators of Scrum.

alignments.name: The Professional Scrum Competencies
alignments.description: Scrum.org created these Professional Scrum Competencies to help guide an individual’s personal development with Scrum.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has passed the Professional Scrum Master I (PSM I) certification assessment with a score of 85% or greater.

e2afb02e-2359-474a-8f62-0084dbecd161.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Product Owner I (PSPO I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of Professional Scrum Product Ownership, proving an intermediate understanding of the Scrum framework and how to apply it to maximize the value delivered with a product. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of how to maximize return on investment and optimize the total cost of ownership of a product.
e2afb02e-2359-474a-8f62-0084dbecd161.name: Professional Scrum Product Owner™ I (PSPO I)

b76143ef-3bf5-4200-bd04-87923ff7e4fc.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Master II (PSM II) certification have demonstrated an advanced level of Scrum mastery and proven an understanding of the underlying principles of Scrum. This individual has also demonstrated the ability to effectively apply Scrum in complex, real-world situations.
b76143ef-3bf5-4200-bd04-87923ff7e4fc.name: Professional Scrum Master™ II (PSM II)

d749adc0-cf3c-4a64-b976-4c992c97065c.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Agile Leadership I (PAL I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of understanding about how agility adds value to their organization and why leadership support of agile teams is essential to achieving organizational agility. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of what leaders can do to support their teams to help them achieve higher performance.
d749adc0-cf3c-4a64-b976-4c992c97065c.name: Professional Agile Leadership™ I (PAL I)

406798a8-4deb-460d-9b02-4aa06c656e07.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Developer I (PSD I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of professional software development, proving an understanding of the Scrum framework and how to work as part of a Scrum Team. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of building useful and valuable Increments every Sprint and applying contemporary software engineering practices and tooling.
406798a8-4deb-460d-9b02-4aa06c656e07.name: Professional Scrum Developer™ I (PSD I)

72a20015-9bc4-4a32-9618-ec187910313a.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Product Owner II (PSPO II) certification have demonstrated an advanced level of Professional Scrum Product Ownership knowledge. This individual understands what is required to be an effective Product Owner who maximizes value using Scrum. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of professionalism and a commitment to improving the value of a product delivered utilizing Scrum.

e4a2a357-f925-44b9-944a-aedea8abcfaa.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum with Kanban I (PSK I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of understanding of how additional practices from Kanban can be introduced to Scrum Teams, without changing Scrum. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of the benefits Scrum Teams can receive by using Scrum with Kanban.
e4a2a357-f925-44b9-944a-aedea8abcfaa.name: Professional Scrum™ with Kanban I (PSK I)

313392c4-9b9d-4496-a1ba-3c598eeb33a3.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Scaled Professional Scrum (SPS) certification have demonstrated an advanced level of understanding of Scaled Professional Scrum, including how to manage and participate in scaled product delivery using the Nexus framework. This individual has also demonstrated the knowledge needed to apply the appropriate agile practices and scaling fundamentals to multiple Scrum Teams working together.
313392c4-9b9d-4496-a1ba-3c598eeb33a3.name: Scaled Professional Scrum™ (SPS)

54d487f1-6775-46dd-b390-ba958fb8232b.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Agile Leadership - Evidence-Based Management (PAL-EBM) certification have demonstrated an advanced level of understanding about why an empirical approach helps organizations to continuously improve. This includes the knowledge needed to enable agility by measuring value toward strategic goals through the management of customer outcomes, organizational capabilities, and business results using the Evidence-Based Management framework.

6628a234-796e-4d93-a3ce-24d0c2f8a664.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum with User Experience I (PSU I) certification have demonstrated a fundamental level of understanding of how to integrate modern UX practices into their way of working in Scrum and to work effectively within Scrum Teams.

b4502ad4-2abe-4494-929c-401d61a8635f.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Master III (PSM III) certification have demonstrated a distinguished level of Scrum mastery and proven a deep understanding of the application and practices of Scrum and the Scrum Values. This individual has also demonstrated the ability to apply Scrum in a variety of complex team and organizational situations.
b4502ad4-2abe-4494-929c-401d61a8635f.name: Professional Scrum Master™ III (PSM III)

d6590297-0d4c-46c4-9d1d-95c41bbbaee0.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Facilitation Skills (PSFS) certification have demonstrated an understanding on how to harness facilitation principles, skills and techniques, and how effective facilitation can help teams move towards their desired outcomes. This includes leveraging diverse perspectives within a team while working with different team dynamics to improve collaboration and participatory decision making, whether applied to Scrum events or other interactions.

b26783f1-f4da-4a18-ad03-2580c8ea34db.description: Licensed Professional Scrum Trainers have demonstrated in-depth knowledge of Professional Scrum and have experience applying Scrum to help teams solve complex problems. They have also shown the skills necessary to train individuals in Scrum and agile ways of thinking using Scrum.org materials.
b26783f1-f4da-4a18-ad03-2580c8ea34db.name: Professional Scrum Trainer™ (PST)

alignments.name: Professional Scrum Master (PSM) trainer selection process and prerequisites
Professional Scrum Product Owner (PSPO) trainer selection process and prerequisites
Applying Professional Scrum for Software Development (APS-SD) trainer selection process and prerequisites

badge_template_activities.title: Professional Scrum Trainers (PSTs) are professionals licensed by Scrum.org to teach the official Scrum.org curriculum. They are skilled in software development and/or product management. They are experts in Scrum and have extensive experience applying, leading, teaching, and coaching it.

6d5bda53-a04c-4af6-92ac-6b42266e165a.description: Those who earn the globally recognized Professional Scrum Product Owner III (PSPO III) certification have demonstrated a distinguished level of Professional Scrum Product Ownership mastery. This individual has shown a deep understanding of the important role the Product Owner in delivering valuable products. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of professionalism and a commitment to improving the value of a product delivered utilizing Scrum.
6d5bda53-a04c-4af6-92ac-6b42266e165a.name: Professional Scrum Product Owner™ III (PSPO III)
